snippet: He has become boxing’s singular fashion plate, developing and displaying a ring-wear style perhaps best described as Louis Vuitton-meets-Liberace.
lead_paragraph: He has become boxing’s singular fashion plate, developing and displaying a ring-wear style perhaps best described as Louis Vuitton-meets-Liberace.

headline.main: As Floyd Mayweather Jr. Steps Into Ring, He Turns It Into a Catwalk
